game:berrybush-too-cold: Too cold for berries to grow
game:berrybush-too-hot: Too hot for berries to grow
game:berrybush-shed-1day: Fresh berries for less than a day
game:berrybush-sprouting-1day: Sprouts growth in less than a day
game:berrybush-clipping-growth-1day: Grows branches in less than a day
game:placefailure-berrybushclipping: A berry bush clipping must be placed on soil or grafted on top of a berry bush
game:placefailure-berrybushclipping-nott: Cannot graft bush clippings onto this bush
game:placefailure-berrybushclipping-toot: Bush is too tall to graft a clipping onto
